select * from vwFestivalList
where to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
where #{date} between to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select a.festival_seq, a.name, a.time, a.info,to_char(a.start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_date, to_char(a.end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_date, (select img from tblFestivalImg where festival_seq = a.festival_seq) as img, (select festival_location_seq from tblFestivalLocation where festival_seq = a.festival_seq) as festival_location_seq, (select lat from tblFestivalLocation where festival_seq = a.festival_seq) as lat, (select lng from tblFestivalLocation where festival_seq = a.festival_seq) as lng from tblFestival a where festival_seq = #{festival_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblFestival (festival_seq, name, time, info, start_date, end_date) VALUES (seqtblFestival.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{time}, #{info}, TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: select max(festival_seq) as festival_seq from tblFestival
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblFestivalLocation (festival_location_seq, lat, lng, festival_seq) VALUES (seqFestivalLocation.nextVal, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{festival_seq})
INSERT INTO tblFestivalImg (festival_img_seq, img, festival_seq) VALUES (seqtblFestivalImg.NEXTVAL, #{img}, #{festival_seq})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tblFestivalImg where festival_seq = #{festival_seq}
select count(*) from tblFestivalLocation where festival_seq = #{festival_seq}
mapper.update: update tblFestival set name = #{name}, time = #{time}, info = #{info}, start_date = TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), end_date = TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where festival_seq = #{festival_seq}
update tblFestivalLocation set lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng} where festival_seq = #{festival_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from vwLocation where lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng}
